questions.text: Was Engineer A's use of AI to create the report text ethical, given that Engineer A thoroughly checked the report?
questions.focus: AI use for report text generation with thorough verification

questions.text: Was Engineer A's use of AI-assisted drafting tools to create the engineering design documents ethical, given that Engineer A reviewed the design at a high level?
questions.focus: AI use for design generation with cursory review

questions.text: If the use of AI was acceptable, did Engineer A have an ethical obligation to disclose the use of AI in any form to the Client?
